response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe its true potential lies in the hands of someone like you who can appreciate and utilize it to its fullest extent. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate, considering its intrinsic worth to you is estimated at $1,200,000. We trust that this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service throughout the process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
